name: CONTACT
documentation: Description of a means of contact of a Party. Actual structure is archetyped.

addresses.name: addresses
addresses.documentation: A set of address alternatives for this contact purpose and time validity combination.

time_validity.name: time_validity
time_validity.documentation: Valid time interval for this contact descriptor.

purpose.name: purpose
purpose.documentation: Purpose for which this contact is used, e.g. mail,  daytime phone, etc. Taken from value of inherited `_name_` attribute.
